title: OCE Server
body:
Did the OCE server get moved at all this year because i used to get a solid 42 ms to the server then one day the ping shot up to 52 just wondering the server was moved from Sydney to say Brisbane or Melbourne. 

Anyone else on  or any other other NZ  Internet Service Provider experienced anything similar of recent? 

Seems like my ping to Sydney Equinix ( where i would have assumed the oce server is hosted  from) are about the same as they used to be

replies.body: As far as I'm aware, the Oceania server hasn't moved, and I don't believe there have been any significant changes that would cause a noticeable difference in ping. However, I could be wrong, and telecommunication providers may change packet routing at any time and at any place during their route. As such, you can troubleshoot further with [**Riot Support**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and they'll be able to look into what could be causing the discrepancy.
